Scripts.OnValueChanged: -- ChatFrame1:AddMessage(this:GetName().." OnValueChanged. arg1="..tostring(arg1)) if ItemRack.testLoaded then ItemRackOpt.SliderValueChanged() else -- ChatFrame1:AddMessage("Attempted OnValueChanged prior to OnLoad") end

Scripts.OnMouseDown: local check = getglobal(this:GetName().."CheckButton") if check:IsVisible() and check:IsEnabled()==1 then check:SetNormalTexture("Interface\\Buttons\\UI-CheckBox-Down") else ItemRackOptFrame:StartMoving() end
Scripts.OnMouseUp: local check = getglobal(this:GetName().."CheckButton") if check:IsVisible() and check:IsEnabled()==1 then check:SetNormalTexture("Interface\\Buttons\\UI-CheckBox-Up") else ItemRackOptFrame:StopMovingOrSizing() end
Scripts.OnEnter: ItemRackOpt.OptListOnEnter(this:GetID()) local check = getglobal(this:GetName().."CheckButton") if check:IsVisible() and check:IsEnabled()==1 then check:LockHighlight() end
Scripts.OnLeave: GameTooltip:Hide() local check = getglobal(this:GetName().."CheckButton") if check:IsVisible() and check:IsEnabled()==1 then check:UnlockHighlight() end

FontString.text: Выберите слот для привязки к клавише.
